first.subject: Re: John Smith
text: There have been a few incidents

second.subject: Re: Codes
text: How is your first day going?
In this place we keep lots of secrets...
You'll need to utilize the CODE MAN app.
I've given you access to it.
There are clues to codes everywhere... :)
GL HF on your first day
